name: n8n-manage-system
description: 基于 Strapi 的 n8n 管理平台

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && npm run strapi develop
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
